AI Software Engineer  Location: Fargo, ND  Travel: 0-25% based on seasonal needs  Direct Reports - None  Join the team developing cutting edge agricultural technology.   Intelligent Agricultural Solutions LLC (Intelligent Ag) is looking for people who are ready to push the boundaries of what’s possible in agriculture. We are looking for people with passion, positivity, and perseverance to join our team and help bring solutions to farmers and growers.  Intelligent Ag prides itself on our agricultural focus and connection to both the people and the land. We strive to bring game changing technology to all facets of the agriculture industry. Our reputation matters and we focus first and foremost on delivering exceptional customer value and support.  Intelligent Ag emphasizes personal and professional growth for all our team members. We encourage self development and provide the support and guidance suited for you. Expect to find a rewarding, fulfilling culture and career with us at Intelligent Ag.  Position Summary  As an AI Software Engineer on the Intelligent Ag Product team, your job is to develop the next generation algorithmic control and machine learning capabilities of our various acoustic and visual sensing products. You will need expertise and passion in machine learning frameworks, signal analysis, physics, to understand the physical phenomena occurring and translate these events into useful models. All these skills will translate into algorithm development, data science, signal processing, and machine learning.  AI Software Engineers are responsible for developing, programming, and training the algorithms of our products so they function in manners similar to how humans intuitively understand things. You will maintain and develop not only the technology itself, but also all the supporting databases, ingestion methods, and classification tools. The entire product ecosystem will be in your purview, and we will look for your expertise to help us develop the next generations of technology. AI Software Engineers lead, and participate in, data generation, collection, and classification. The Intelligent Ag Product Development and Engineering teams will be fully supportive in these efforts as we collaboratively solve problems.  The ideal candidate for this position is a self-driven individual with a passion for software development with an emphasis on mathematical modeling, signal measurement technology and algorithms, and systems control with a strong background in controls and familiarity with traditional algorithmic and logical solutions to problems. You must have the ability to independently plan, evaluate, select and apply standard or modified engineering techniques, procedures, and criteria. You must be able to receive general instructions and be able to develop and communicate to others, complex features, and possible solutions. You must be comfortable providing tasks and giving direction to team members who are assisting in this work.  Essential Duties and Responsibilities   The essential functions include, but are not limited to, the following:  Builds, iterates upon, and improves AI and machine learning models  Develops and automates infrastructures for data science, data transformation, and ingestion.  Creates and manages the Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning development process and overall infrastructure of the products.  Uses and develops best practices in regards to speech recognition, visual classification, data processing, and data mining.  Conducts statistical analysis and interpreting the results to guide product improvements.  Developing machine learning models into APIs that other applications can interact with.  Being the Subject Matter Expert for all Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Product algorithms for Intelligent Ag.  Modifies existing products or assist develop of new products as assigned that meet customer features and functions including cost, reliability and quality requirements by implementing the standard and advanced design techniques and coordinating with others to achieve results  Generates, reviews and verifies supporting documentation is adequate to meet project requirements and allows good maintenance and enhancement activities to occur while also being neat and organized per our engineering procedures.  Reviews the design of others to ensure accuracy and proper application of engineering techniques and works closely with other designated engineering personnel to ensure designs meet all design specifications.  Provide guidance in how new products should be developed to best fit the portfolio of Intelligent Ag products.  Lead and participate in architectural and discovery activities to best serve the overall Product Strategy and development process. This includes vision ideation for new feature, test/verification ecosystems development, and verification planning  Continue to develop and advance their technical expertise in the company and industry through continuing education, peer groups, and professional organizations.  Travel to the field to understand issues and accomplish corrective actions. Items may include meeting with customers, installing and testing prototypes, troubleshooting, and data collection.  Assist with Product Management and Support activities as needed. These activities will include review of new features, roadmap  discussion, and architecture ideation.   Identify and participate in self-development and growth opportunities to develop your own abilities as an individual contributor and  leader.  Performance Metrics  Diagnose and correct urgent bug fixes during busy season   Deliver on algorithm and accuracy improvements in evidence based manners  Plan and execute work on a definite schedule  Effectively develop feature enhancements on a cadence to allow proper field verification  Successfully accomplish 80% or more of personal quarterly and annuals goals  Commit to personal improvement training annually   Minimum Qualifications (Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities)  B.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering and/or training or equivalent combination of education and experience  3-5 years of relevant experience; agricultural background/experience a plus  Strong background in mathematics, machine learning, and system algorithm and control  Experience with design of models using one or more major machine learning frameworks (Tensorflow, Keras, TFLite, PyTorch)  Experience optimizing and deploying models  Experience in the storage and management of large datasets  Background in signal analysis and data analytics  Proficiency in at least one object oriented language (Swift /Java / Objective C / C++ / C# preferred)  Preferred: Proficiency in embedded devices (ARM Chipset), C++, Linux, Python, and Yocto  Continually learning about new technologies and development practices  Discipline to follow development / design processes  Ability to convey information in written form both narratively and technically  General capability to understand and develop spreadsheets, PowerPoints, and general documentation
